alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Northern Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 10:06AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow will affect Washington and Hancock Counties... At 1003 AM EST...An area of heavy snow was 11 miles south of Grand Falls, or 18 miles east of Old Town. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Bar Harbor, Bucksport, Calais, Blue Hill, Machias, Lubec, Eastport, Cherryfield, Dedham, Jonesport, Steuben, Harrington, Perry, Pembroke, Princeton, Jonesboro, Columbia Falls, Cutler and Columbia. This includes the following highways... US Highway 1 between Ellsworth and Princeton. State Highway 9 between Amherst and Calais. * Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow. * Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are occurring in this area of heavy snow. Icy roads are possible as the snow melts on the roads then quickly refreezes.
